channel.title: Is there one ultimate client to use for them all?
channel.description:
im a new to creating my own runescape private servers and im tired of download sources with the clients cause if i dont like the source then i gotta re-download another client sooo if there is one "ultimate" client please post a link thank you
-Corey

item.title: Is there one ultimate client to use for them all?
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

Well, I had this problem too and I just solved it today. I downloaded pkplanet and i think it’s great… Had to edit some stuff but it has 474 animations and great client So just search that in server downloads and try it out.

P.S: You don’t have to have the same client that goes with the source… some clients don’t work with some sources but some are compatible so if you like a certain client but don’t like the source, download a different source and keep the client and see if they are compatible together.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there one ultimate client to use for them all?
